items.name: Wordle
items.description: Guess the hidden word in 6 tries. A new puzzle is available each day.

items.name: Nerdle
items.description: Guess the equation in 6 tries - try classic, mini, speed and pro.

items.name: Semantle
items.description: Guess the mystery word via semantic similarity.

items.name: Quordle
items.description: Put your skills to the test and solve four Wordles at once!

items.name: Heardle
items.description: Guess the song from the intro in as few tries as possible.

items.name: Globle
items.description: Use your geography knowledge to figure out the mystery country in as few guesses as possible!
